page.title: 13COMMUNICATION
page.content: {Ellon}is built at the main bridging point of the{River Ythan.}It is the point where all the main roads meet: {A92(T),}Ellon to Peterhead heading in a north easterly direction;{A92(T) Ellon to Aberdeen heading in a southerly direction;{A920}heading in a westerly direction and the{A948 heading north. There is a B road, {B9005}coming into Ellon from a north westerly direction. There is a large number of roads which are unclassified in the surrounding areas and also in the town itself. Instead of all of the traffic going into Ellon a new{by-pass is planned to stop all the traffic travelling into the town itself. It is planned to start by the beginning of {1986.}The disused Aberdeen to Fraserburgh railway line which ran through Ellon was closed in{1976.
